mil7.3.8:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘niyamakassa tini angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani tini angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.3.8:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, niyamako rattindivam satatam samitam appamatto yattappayatto navam sareti;
mil7.3.8:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena cittam niyamayamanena rattindivam satatam samitam appamattena yattappayattena yoniso manasikarena cittam niyametabbam.
mil7.3.8:1.4: Idam, maharaja, niyamakassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.8:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, niyamakassa yam kinci mahasamudde kalyanam va papakam va, sabbam tam viditam hoti;
mil7.3.8:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kusalakusalam savajjanavajjam hinappanitam kanhasukkasappatibhagam vijanitabbam.
mil7.3.8:3.3: Idam, maharaja, niyamakassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.8:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, niyamako yante muddikam deti ‘ma koci yantam amasittha’ti;
mil7.3.8:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena citte samvaramuddika databba ‘ma kinci papakam akusalavitakkam vitakkesi’ti, idam, maharaja, niyamakassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.8:4.4: ‘ma, bhikkhave, papake akusale vitakke vitakkeyyatha, seyyathidam—
